name: groggily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a weak way that shows you cannot think clearly or walk normally, usually because you have been asleep or are tired or ill: He sat up groggily and rubbed his throbbing head. "What?" she asked groggily. Related word
groggy
More examplesFewer examplesHe opened his eyes and looked around groggily.The driver of the other car was holding a hand groggily to her head.She sat down groggily at the breakfast table.She sat up groggily. "For heaven's sake, what's the matter?"His opponent fell back down and was counted out by the referee as he rose groggily to his feet.
